item.title: Spirit Realm
item.description: The Spirit Realm goes by many names: The Dreaming, the Astral, the Deep Ethereal.

item.title: index
item.description: The planes of existence that exist in the World Anew setting. If your character would know this content if they have proficiency in Arcana.

item.title: index
item.description: See: Google Docs: World Anew - Lawless - Player’s guide (which might eventually get migrated here) D&D 5e doc - House rules .

item.title: 2025-09-17 - Session -1
item.description: Zach, Bill, & Zbo got together to chat about rules while Tobin and Stacy where out.

item.title: 2025-09-23 - Session 0
item.description: Wrapped up Dargrim (Interlude I - Finnan’s Windsong).

item.title: 2025-10-02 - Session 0B
item.description: Stacy couldn’t make it, so the rest of us spent the evening optimizing character options: skills, languages, tool profs, spells, equipment boons, etc.

item.title: 2025-10-07 - Session 1
item.description: The party meets on the stagecoach running from Ogallah to Deadbridge. The stagecoach is run by Mad Mattie and Gus the Gobber.

item.title: 2025-10-14 - Session 2
item.description: Behind the roadhouse in Chugwater, the party catches their breath after killing a gnoll warband. They quickly check the bodies.

item.title: 2025-10-21 - Session 3
item.description: As the party walks into Holler Saloon, Arlo’s friend, Ernie Buckner, calls out to him.

item.title: 2025-10-28 - Session 4
item.description: The party stands outside the livery stable with their newly rented horses, ready to go hunt Old Krorg, the owlbear.
